Items.Name: Gibbons Engineering Group Ltd
Items.Description: Gibbons Engineering Group Ltd are a specialist electrical and mechanical engineering company, based in Essex, supplying variable speed drive solutions to industry.

Items.Name: Giovanni Vignuda Automazioni S.r.l.
Items.Description:
La storia

“Gjovanìn Turbine” così veniva chiamato a San Daniele del Friuli Giovanni 
Vignuda (classe 1905 e vissuto fino a 92 anni). Nel 1921 aprì una piccola 
officina di elettrauto dopo aver frequentato i corsi di elettrotecnica 
all’Istituto professionale Giovanni da Udine nel capoluogo friulano (recandosi 
naturalmente in bicicletta la domenica mattina). La passione per l’aspetto 
elettrico industriale non tardò a venire a galla e nel 1935 Giovanni Vignuda 
firmò il suo primo appalto di una certa importanza, ovvero il primo lotto 
dell’Ospedale civile di Udine. Ora la Giovanni Vignuda Automazioni S.r.l. 
opera, con oltre 60 anni di esperienza, nel campo della installazione di 
impianti elettrici industriali per la produzione, trasporto e produzione di 
energia elettrica specializzata nell’automazione delle centrali idroelettriche 
(con oltre 43 realizzazioni al suo attivo).

Address.StreetAddress: Ground Floor, Building no 578A, Street 1008, PO Box 845

Items.Description:

We at Granite has the privilege to think smart, think long, think again. That

Items.Name: Hanley Technology Ltd
Items.Description:
Hanley Technology is dedicated to providing its customers with the latest technology to ensure accuracy, reliability, cost effectiveness and the achievement of their quality targets. Since its foundation in 1987 the company has continually strived to provide its customers with best in class solutions to measure and control critical process parameters. For over three decades we have continually embraced new technologies ensuring our customers have the most detailed and accuracy process information enabling real-time analyses to optimise performance.

As the IOT’s develops Hanley Technology are providing primary sensors, wireless infrastructure and smart interfaces for harsh and hazardous environments enabling our customers to measure and control locally whilst also enabling data to be transmitted to MES and control system.

Items.Name: Hans Lofqvist Engineering AB
Items.Description:
From the outset the aim was clear. We call it: industrial automation with 
robotics. Another way to say it is: complete solutions for unmanned production, 
for a vibrant and competitive Swedish industry.

Swedish industry is strong and there is so much knowledge in this country, but 
we must get to the most rational and cost-efficient as possible in order to be 
competitive. That's where we at Löfqvist Engineering comes into play. With the 
help of well-adapted robot investment, each manufacturer maximize production, 
minimize strenuous and monotonous tasks and increase the quality of outcome.

We work across the country in all industries and companies. With broad and deep 
process knowledge, we can easily go into both small businesses as automotive to 
find new solutions. Maybe we have the solution to your problems.

Items.Name: Harzer Antriebstechnik GmbH
Items.Description:
Weitere Expertise in folgenden ABB-Produktbereichen: - 
Messtechnik-Produkte (Druck, Temparatur, Durchfluss, Füllstand) - 
Niederspannungsprodukte (Installationsgeräte, Leistungsschalter, Schalt- und 
Schutztechnik)

Die Harzer Antriebstechnik GmbH  ist ein Unternehmen, welches seit 1991 
maßgeschneiderte Automatisierungslösungen und Komponenten für ein breites 
Kundenspektrum konzipiert, umsetzt und verkauft. Mit einem erfahrenen Team aus 
Ingenieuren, Technikern und Kaufleuten stellen wir sowohl unter technischen, 
als auch ökonomischen Gesichtspunkten, Ihre optimale Automatisierungslösung 
zusammen. Ein breites Produktspektrum, starke Partner, hohe Flexibilität und 
Qualität sichern Ihnen, bei einem guten Preis- & Leistungsverhältnis, die 
maximale Wirtschaftlichkeit. 
Fragen Sie uns an und lassen Sie sich von unserer Leistungsfähigkeit, Qualität 
und Flexibilität überzeugen – wir freuen uns auf Ihre Anforderungen!

Items.Name: Heinz Berger Maschinenfabrik GmbH & Co
Items.Description:
For more than 70 years, Berger has been building grinding and polishing 
machines are designed specifically for Which the demands of the cutlery and 
hand tool manufacturing industry, but that is for utilization in other branches 
of metalworking

Items.Name: Hi Tech Products Inc
Items.Description: Hi-Tech Products Inc. represents Electronic, Electrical and Automation manufacturers with an emphasis on technical sales. Since 1991 our company has been one of the leading suppliers of industrial controls in Puerto Rico, Dominican Republic and the Caribbean. We also deliver complete system solutions, undertaking sales, start-up assistance and services. We are committed to becoming your automation controls source. Our commitment is to the high quality of our products, total customer satisfaction and spirit of excellence. The expertise in products, applications and technology is our strength.

Items.Name: High Technology Control - VIC
Items.Description:
Established in 1985, High Technology Control started operations from Premises 
at 1 Arab Rd Padstow. This Head Office location is in the approximate centre of 
Sydney which allows us the most efficient way of servicing our Sydney customer 
base and is very close to the airport which allows us to better serve our 
interstate customers. Our current address of 8 Stuart St Padstow is right next 
door to our original premises and was purpose built by us to serve our 
customer’s needs. High Technology Control Has an Office in both Sydney and
Melbourne and has close collaboration with like minded high quality companies 
in other states. The company was established by its three current directors, 
Brian Laird, Rodney Hunt and Michael Linden with the original aim to provide 
engineering maintenance services specifically for Computer Numerical 
Controllers and Industrial Computer systems. Our early years saw great growth 
with service being the mainstay of our business and Retrofitting of machine 
tools with new CNC units being our major growth area. Since that time the mix
of products and services has changed, however our dedication to provide the 
most professional Engineering services has not changed and High Technology 
Control and HTC MEDICAL prides itself in keeping abreast of the latest 
technologies with constant training as well as local and overseas visits to 
trade shows. We see our role as not only providing our customers with the most 
cost effective and up to date equipment but also being able to provide the 
correct advice even if it means losing a sale. This commitment has enhanced our 
reputation and has ensured our long term growth. Our partnership with ABB low 
voltage products, Fagor Automation and Glentek Servo Systems has given us an 
industrial customer base which I am sure is the envy of many of our 
competitors. The mainstay of our business has always been maintenance services 
and because we have developed a reputation for excellence in this area it has
allowed us to grow into other service areas such as Medical Service. The new
medical division of HTC MEDICAL is now the most important Service sector of our 
business and is continuing to expand.

Items.Name: Hot Melt & Packaging Systems
Items.Description:
Specialists in the development and manufacture of quality high-value machinery 
for the automation of carton packaging processes, Hot Melt & Packaging Systems 
consists of a dynamic and specialised team of 34 people.
 
Hot Melt & Packaging Systems reacts immediately to changing market conditions 
and customers wishes. We are very flexible due to our design and production 
systems and differentiate ourselves from our competitors in that apart from our 
standard product range, we offer custom-made solutions at short notice.
 
Hot Melt & Packaging Systems is extraordinarily innovative and export 
orientated with approximately 20% of our annual production going to customers 
outside of Australia.
 
Our ethic is quality at sensible prices. Our customers, amongst whom are 
renowned manufacturers of food and beverage products, value this approach. The 
adherence to delivery schedules and optimal customer service are constant 
factors in our company's direction.
 
Hot Melt & Packaging Systems is continuously interested in creating new 
business contacts on the basis of mutual trust with both our customers and 
support.

Items.Name: How Tong Co Ltd
Items.Description:
浩通股份有限公司創立於2008年，為TWABB經銷商銷售ABB中、高壓產品(7.2KV-115KV)，主要產品為:
VCB /GCB / VCS/DS/LBS/CT/PT/LA/Fuse/Relay
69KV GCB /ABS/PT/CT/LA  MV-CGIS/AIS/DRY DTR，
主要業務:
1.	備有庫存可提供以上產品銷售。
2.	提供設計單位ABB產品資料、規範及相關應用建議，配合先期設計規畫工作。
3.	中壓銷售及售後服務、保養工作及教育訓練。
4.	提供汰換案件服務建議書。
5.	施工及汰換案件施工。
6.	有足夠專業人員可完整提供電力案件設計、規劃、執行、售服等專業化服務。

Items.Description:
Hydrotek Engineering Company is today one of the leading companies in
Kuwait in the fields of water and waste water.
The company was established in January 2001. Started initially as a trading
company, Hydrotek Engineering Company gradually grew into various areas

- Pumps
- Water treatment equipment

- Piping systems
- Water tanks
- Valves

- Fire protection equipment
- Heat transfer equipment & solutions

- Library furniture
- Power tools
- HVAC equipment

Market Knowledge
Strong relations with end users and consultants.
Good relations with all EPC’s. 
Pro-active sales approach
Solution Providers
Qualified team strength

Items.Name: iconsys (Independent Control Systems Ltd)
Items.Description:
iconsys is a leading UK automation solutions provider and systems integrator.  Well established and highly respected, we combine innovative technologies with extensive industry knowledge and experience, supporting you throughout the asset lifecycle to enhance the performance of your business.

From concept to completion and beyond, you can count on iconsys to design, deliver and develop solutions for every stage of the project lifecycle, ensuring continuous and improvement to keep your operation at optimum efficiency.

Our vision is to lead customers into the digital era, through close working partnership built on trust.  We are driven to delivering world-class solutions that inspire change across multiple markets.

Items.Name: ICT Group N.V.
Items.Description:
Automating a complex process into a working system is one thing. But how do you create an IT solution that yields much more? How do you ensure more speed? More convenience? More sustainability? More return? That's just a challenge.

ICT Group is happy to take on that challenge. Because the more complicated the project, the more enthusiastic we become. And the more ambitious the target, the more we push our limits. That's what drives us. And that's why we've been successful in technology and industrial markets for over 40 years.

With more than 1400 professionals, we are happy to help companies, products and projects with smart, innovative, integrated and, above all, challenging ICT solutions.

Do you have a challenge that demands the maximum from ICT?

Challenge us!

Items.Name: IMA Automatizacion Ltda
Items.Description: ENGIE Services (IMA Automatizacion) es una empresa que ofrece servicios y soluciones tecnológicas a la industria de procesos productivos basados en nuestro conocimiento y experiencia, generando valor en forma permanente a nuestros clientes, colaboradores, accionistas y comunidad.

Items.Name: Imatec Impex S.r.l.
Items.Description:
IMATEC  is an authorized partner of ABB in Romania for the distribution and implementation of equipment for measuring, control and regulation of industrial processes, as well as for process analytical equipment.

Our goal is to make it as easy as possible for you to choose, purchase, install and operate the measuring and analytical equipment you need - so that you can focus on your business.

Items.Name: Importadora Gutierrez S.r.l.
Items.Description:
Fundada en 1978 como una empresa dedicada al servicio de la micro-industria agropecuaria, IMGUCA ha gozado de una trayectoria paralela a la economía dominicana, evolucionando primero hacia la macro-industria agrícola en los años 80 y pasando luego a la industria en general en los años 90. 

IMGUCA está en una posición privilegiada de poder asistir a nuestros clientes con una combinación única de variedad, disponibilidad, conocimiento y experiencia.

Misión: Generarle a nuestros clientes el mayor valor posible a través de la maximización del retorno sobre inversión.

Visión: Ser la empresa líder en diseño, suministro, mantenimiento y consultoría de sistemas de transmisión y control de potencia, y manejo masivo de materiales.
Valores:
Seguridad

Innovación

Items.Name: iNDAT Robotics GmbH
Items.Description:
Solutions that access.

We combine process know-how with expertise in the engineering and engineering 
solutions that access:
Custom robots for automating complex manufacturing, Assembly and handling 
processes - individually designed and built turnkey
Robot cells with high manufacturing flexibility, easily   adaptable and quick 
to integrate
Gantry robots for special requirements
In-plant conveying systems and transport systems
Retrofit of machines or equipment, and energy optimization

Our know-how about processes and interfaces of modern production processes from 
the outset ensures an optimum technical design, implementation, and integration 
of the equipment. Since the company was founded in 1994, we have far more as 
500 machines and robot cells for automated production technology designed and 
built.

These projects document not only our extensive process knowledge, but also the 
completeness of our services. The in-house departments for 3D simulation, 
mechanical and electrical design as well as for SPS/SSPS programming and 
software development, guarantee the necessary flexibility and reaction of 
system control and integration. In our production centre in 
Ginsheim-Gustavsburg, the facilities are built and installed.

Today are over 100 dedicated employees at the sites in 
Ginsheim-Gustavsburgemployed in Mainz and in Wolfsburg.

Address.StreetAddress: Delta House, Meadows Road, Queensway Meadows

Items.Name: Industrial Automation & Control Ltd
Items.Description:
IAC is one of the leading industrial control systems integrators in the UK, 
with operations world-wide. The company operates from a modern facility in 
Newport, South Wales, employing over 65 people at this site and another 30 
around the world.

IAC has a particular expertise in the application and manufacture of variable 
speed drive systems, along with vast experience in PLC and SCADA design. IAC 
engineers possess over 700 man years of experience dating back to the 1970’s

The industrial focus of IAC is spread across almost every industry. IAC have 
successfully installed systems in Metals, Paper, Materials Handling, Chemicals, 
Oil and Gas, Pharmaceuticals, Aggregates, Converting, Plastics, Aeronautical, 
Automotive, Munitions and Food and Beverage. Regular customers include Tata, 
Metso Minerals, Eastman, Amazon, AB In Bev, Dupont, Siemens Metal Technologies, 
Evoqua, Cumberland……

The company has a clearly stated goal “To maintain long term employment for our 
workforce”. We will strive to enable our employees to line up their own 
personal goals with those of the company. We will use new technology wherever 
possible to help our drive for efficiency.

Items.Name: Industrial Automation Solutions Inc
Items.Description:
IAS Worldwide is an engineering company focused on helping our customers 
navigate, refine and deploy their initiatives for automation and integration. 
IAS is a diverse and experienced company that is committed to optimizing your 
operations and providing innovative automation solutions, enabling advance in 
your competitive advantage.

Items.Name: Industrial Supplies Center LLC (ISC)
Items.Description:
Industrial Supplies Center LLC (ISC), is the channel partner and distributor of 
ABB motors in Oman. We stock and supply wide range of motors including Process 
performance Motor, General Performance Motor, Flame Proof Motors, Explosion 
proof (Ex nA) Motors, NEMA Motors etc.   We deal with supply of wide range of 
Oil & Gas, Industrial, Engineering and Construction products, Equipment & 
Machinery. Our product line includes Instrumentation, Piping Systems, Motors, 
Drives & Control, Tools & Consumables, Pumping Solutions, Hydraulics, 
Pneumatics,   Machineries, Industrial Spare-parts, Measuring & Testing 
Instruments, Electrical, Electronics, Complete Safety Solutions,  Lifting’s, 
Fasteners.

Our specialised Services is in deployment of TurnKey projects in INDSUTRIAL 
AUTOMATION, CENTRALIZED FIRE MONITORING SYSTEM, FLARE RECOVERY AT O&G FIELDS, 
POWER TRANSFORMER PROTECTION SYSTEM; other services includes Waterjet Cutting, 
Turning, Rolling, Bending, Hydraulic Hose Crimping, Manufacturing of Hydraulic 
and Pneumatic Cylinders and Hydraulic Seals. We also deal with Ground Anchoring 
solutions, Industrial Fabrication, Designing etc. We provide highest quality 
standards and ensure cost effectiveness and after-sales services.

We deliver our products and services to major industrial sectors in Oman, which 
includes; Oil & Gas sectors, Food & Beverages, Chemical, Water sector, Mining, 
Electro Mechanical, Contracting Companies, Marine Companies, Ministries, 
Engineering and Fabrication sector, Manufacturing Industries and Technical 
Institutions.

Our main showroom is located at Mabella Industrial Area, Barka Industrial Area; 
We also have sales supports at Muscat, Nizwa and Sohar.

Address.StreetAddress: Calle Lazaro Cardenas No 5 Col. San Lucas Tepetlacalco

Items.Name: INGENIERIA EN CONTROL Y AUTOMATISMOS, S.A. DE C.V.
Items.Description:
Nuestra compañía es la sucesora de una empresa fundada en 1988, llamada 
Ingeniería Mexicana en Control Aplicado S.A. de C.V. (IMCA), nos dedicamos a 
los proyectos de velocidad control de posición y automatización 
industrial.

Nuestra compañía cuenta con servicio en sitio o nuestro propio laboratorio, 
teniendo disponibilidad para atender urgencias  24 / 365.

Contamos con amplia experiencia en los segmentos:

• Pulpa y Papel
• Metales
• Cemento
• Minería y Agregados
• Manejo de Materiales
• Industria Azucarera
• Ventilación y Bombeo
